section.name: About OpenDJ LDAP SDK Examples
section.p: This module contains 5 example LDAP applications implemented using the OpenDJ LDAP SDK:

ul.li: LDAP search - illustrates how to perform an LDAP search operation using the synchronous APIs
LDAP asynchronous search - illustrates how to perform an LDAP search operation using the asynchronous APIs
LDAP modify - illustrates how to perform an LDAP modify operation using the synchronous APIs
LDAP server - illustrates how to implement a very simple LDAP server
LDAP proxy - illustrates how to implement a very simple LDAP proxy

section.name: Get the OpenDJ LDAP SDK Examples
section.p: You can get the OpenDJ LDAP SDK examples using any of the following methods:

subsection.name: Download
subsection.p: The easiest way to download the OpenDJ LDAP SDK Examples and all of its dependencies is to get the latest version from our repository .

subsection.name: Build
subsection.p: For the DIY enthusiasts you can build it yourself by checking out the latest code using Subversion and building it with Maven 3
